description:
Get a feel for the mountain with low-profile bindings that give great terrain feedback and performance on-piste. The Strive 14 features an ultra low-profile toe piece which creates a low center of gravity for enhanced control and response. The binding lets the characteristics of the ski and slope excel, creating a better day on your skis.

  • Low profile chassis for increased terrain feedback and power transmission
  • LDN Toe has an ultra-low center of gravity so skiers can feel the sensations of all terrain underfoot
  • Super-wide toe pedal ensures lateral power transmission from skier to ski
  • 47mm of elastic travel prevents pre-release
  • DIN settings of 5 to 14 offer a range wide enough for most aggressive skiers
name: Salomon Strive 14 MN Bindings with Brake
